summary: Cult leader Jim Jones leads his followers to a mass-suicide.
cast: Ted Biggs|Stephan Jones|Vernon Gosney|Tim Reiterman|Sherwin Harris|Rick Roberts|Quentin Krog|Brendan Murray|Alon Nashman|Greg Ellwand|Kevin Otto|Roxanne Blaise|Cindi Sampson|Victoria Bartlett|Nicole Crozier|Dean Slater|Adrienne Pierce|Pope Jerrod|Patrick Lyster|Olive Cele|Franklin English|Brendan Murray|Rick Roberts|Dan Hirst|Jon Plowman
title: Jonestown: Paradise Lost
